in_ports.name: contours
in_ports.hint:
Existing contours: serialized array of several contours.
Can be skipped; then new points will be the only contours in the result.

in_ports.name: added
in_ports.hint:
Serialized contours array or list of points of a single contour: it will be added to the existing contours.
Can be skipped: then "list of points" parameter will be used instead.

controls.name: objectLabel
controls.caption: Object label
controls.description: Label, that will be associated with the new contour(s).

controls.name: internalContour
controls.caption: Internal contour
controls.description:
Whether new contour(s) is an internal (pore) or external (particle).
This and previous argument are ignored, if "added" input port contains serialized contour array.

controls.name: points
controls.caption: List of points
controls.description:
Used when the source points array is not specified. Must contain 2N integer numbers, separated by spaces or commas, where N is the number of points in a new contour. You may specify here several contours, separated by ;
Note: if the list of points is empty, the original contour array is returned unchanged.
